summary: During the last days of Eva Peron, a pair of low-ranking detectives are thrust into a case of corruption involving the Mafia.
cast: Ricardo Darín|Diego Peretti|Julieta Díaz|Andrea Pietra|Vando Villamil|Carlos Bardem|Luciano Cáceres|Georgina Rey|Walter Santa Ana|Martín Slipak|Luis Solanas
title: La señal
